faqs.question: How long does it take to build a website?
faqs.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project. A basic website takes 1-2 weeks, while a custom e-commerce site may take 4-12 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

faqs.question: Do you provide website maintenance after launch?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive maintenance packages starting from à§³5,000/month. This includes security updates, content updates, performance monitoring, and technical support.

faqs.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! All our websites are built with a mobile-first approach, ensuring they work perfectly on smartphones, tablets, and desktops. Mobile responsiveness is included in all our packages.

faqs.question: Can you help with SEO and digital marketing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive SEO services including keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, and local SEO specifically for Bangladesh market. We also provide ongoing digital marketing support.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept bank transfers, mobile banking (bKash, Rocket, Nagad), and cash payments. We typically require 50% upfront and 50% upon project completion.

faqs.question: Do you work with international clients?
faqs.answer: Yes, while we're based in Rajshahi, Bangladesh, we work with clients globally. We're experienced in international payment methods and time zone coordination.

faqs.question: Can you redesign my existing website?
faqs.answer: Certainly! We offer website redesign services to modernize your existing site, improve performance, and enhance user experience. We can work with your current content or help create new content.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: We use modern technologies including React, Next.js, WordPress, PHP/Laravel, Node.js, and various databases. We choose the best technology stack based on your specific requirements.
